ï»¿On Wednesday, CNN reported that the curse of the World Cup continues...
...as Germany became the third straight reigning champion...
...to be knocked out in the group stage.
Germany now joins Italy and Spain as part of the curse...
...after it was beaten 2-0 by South Korea in Group F.
That result, coupled with Sweden's 3-0 win over Mexico...
...in the other group match, meant the Swedes and Mexico...
This marks the second time in Germany's World Cup history...
...that it has failed to progress from the first round.
